title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. J, pt. 401 - Application Of Chair Rules To The Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. J, pt. 401 - Application Of Chair Rules To The Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law

State Regulations
§ 401.1 - Medical care; arbitration of medical and hospital bills; podiatry care; chiropractic care; psychology care
§ 401.2 - Medical fee schedule
§ 401.3 - Outpatient fee schedule
§ 401.4 - Podiatry fee schedule
§ 401.5 - Chiropractic fee schedule
§ 401.6 - Psychology fee schedule
§ 401.7 - Ambulatory surgery services fee schedule

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. J, pt. 401

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 13, 13-k, 13-l, 13-m, 117, 141, 157; Volunteer Ambulance Workers'
Benefit Law, §§ 16, 57, 58; Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law, §§ 16, 57, 58

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
